name: Routine
headline: Most advanced calendar for busy professionals, with tasks & notes
description:
Routine is an all-in-one workspace that allows individuals and team to manage their work and life through a single app, both on desktop and mobile.

With Routine, entrepreneurs, CEOs, investors, executives and managers around the world stay on top of things and accomplish more.

Routine has been created in 2020 by Julien Quintard and Quentin Hocquet, serial entrepreneurs who previously founded Infinit which they sold to [Docker](http://www.docker.com) in 2016.

founders.name: Julien Quintard, Founder
founders.description: Former researcher/lecturer (University of Cambridge), investor (business angel & Techstars) and entrepreneur (Infinit, Routine).

generated_description:
**Routine: Redefining Productivity for Professionals**

Founded in 2020 by seasoned entrepreneurs Julien Quintard and Quentin Hocquet, Routine has quickly gained traction as a cutting-edge productivity tool designed primarily for busy professionals. The company, based in Paris and part of Y Combinator's W21 Batch, aims to combine calendar management with tasks and notes, all within a single, seamless application that works across desktop and mobile platforms.

### Mission and Offerings

Routine's mission is straightforward: to be the most advanced calendar for professionals juggling multiple responsibilities. The platform allows users—including CEOs, entrepreneurs, and managers—to streamline their work and life management effectively. Its features encompass not just calendaring but also task management, note-taking, project planning, and even AI assistance. The goal is to minimize overwhelming complexities by integrating all workflows into one accessible interface.

### Key Features

1. **Planner**: Helps in prioritizing tasks and structuring daily agendas.
2. **Dashboard**: A centralized space for tracking all activities.
3. **Console**: Enables quick data capture without the need to switch contexts.
4. **Meeting Notes**: Keep track of discussions and decisions effortlessly.
5. **Reminders and Notifications**: Ensure nothing slips through the cracks.

The app also boasts integrations with various services, empowering users to capture and link data without the hassle of manual input, thus saving precious time.

### User Base and Team

With a growing team of 14 professionals, Routine has tailored its solutions for both individuals and teams. It accommodates users who want a personal tool to manage their tasks effectively and organizations that need collaborative solutions for project and knowledge management.

### Recognition and Feedback

Routine has quickly become a favorite among leading entrepreneurs and investors. Users rave about its intuitive design and efficient functionalities; many highlight how it significantly reduces their stress and time waste. People are particularly impressed by how it merges tasks and scheduling into a single platform.

### Conclusion

In a world where time is the ultimate currency, Routine delivers a promising blend of simplicity and sophistication for task and schedule management. Its innovative approach and user-centric design offer a glimpse into the future of productivity tools tailored for those who refuse to let their busy lives dictate their efficiency. Ready to enhance your productivity? [Try Routine today.](http://routine.co/</get-started>)
